WorkItem.ClosedComment: We've already responded to this in that we are doing the 1 sec intentionally, we don't know why you want 5 sec
WorkItem.Description:
The duration for a double pot trick shows 1 second less duration then the single pot use.  It should be approximately 5-10 seconds (minimum 5 seconds to be able to use a potion again) less then the length of the two potions' durations.
 
 Versions where I've observed the error:  2.2.21, 2.2.24, 2.2.27
 
Steps to reproduce:
 
Start Rawr
 
Go to the Buffs tab
 
Scroll down to the potions area
 
Check the 'double pot trick' durations
 
Using a single pot will show a duration of x seconds, while double potting shows x-1 seconds.

Comments.Message:
Sage things that the duration of the "Double Pot Trick (Potionname)" is the total buff duration.  It's not.  That second checkbox is the ADDITIONAL bonus you get -- the first checkbox is for the regular potion.
[_] Potion of Speed (15sec/20min)
.....[_] Potion of Speed (Double Pot Trick) (14sec/20min)

In order to check the second one, you must also check the first one.  Checking the first one gives you 500 haste rating for 15secs every 20mins.  Checking the second one ADDS ANOTHER BUFF for 14secs every 20mins.  Net result is 500 haste for 15secs and another 500haste for 14secs, total of 500haste for 29secs.
